name: Jurassic Dino Park Hunting
description:
Jurassic Dino Park Hunting is an FPS Survival Game of dino shooting to kill dinos of multiple type with killing attempts of deadly dinos in deadly shores stunts. Avoids Dinosaurs Attack and become killer of dinosaurs by using other types of guns including snipers of types which will make you able to hunt safari deadly Dinosaur into rivers, mountains and jungle. In this exciting dinosaur fight game, there is only one winner you or your enemy. So, kill the dinosaurs before they kill you.
Features
- Choose Dinosaur of your choice for hunting or shooting.
- Amazing graphics and serene environment.
- Smooth gameplay with attacking animations.
- Multiple thrilling levels containing a different number of dinosaurs.
- Different sniper guns.
